title: Synthesis, DFT, and in silico biological evaluation of chalcone bearing pyrazoline ring against Helicobacter pylori receptors

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Najla A. Alshaye, Nuha Salamah Alharbi, Mohamed A. El-Atawy, Reham O. El-Zawawy, Ezzat A. Hamed, Mohammed Elhag, Hoda A. Ahmed, Alaa Z. Omar
